title: So my account has been hacked PLEASE RIOTER LOOK AT THIS PLEASE!
body: So my account has been hacked i went to unrecoverable account thing then submitted a request went to click the ticket from my email and it says login to league of legends to see it and i'm like my account is hacked thats why im doing this like wtf i have receipts on my email of my riot point purchases like someone from riot please help me!!!!!!!!!!!!

replies.body: We can help!  Fill out an [account recovery form](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new?ticket_form_id=72416) which doesn't require you to login, and be sure to include an email address you currently have access to.  Our account team will investigate and get back to you as soon as they can!
I did that but everytime i clicked the link it said login!!!!!!

This link is different from the standard ticket submission.  It doesn't require you to login, and instead offer a form to fill out.  If you run into issues, try disabling extensions, Incognito, or another browser.

You can also email us directly via support@riotgames.com!
if i can't get my account back welp guess i'm never playing league again
